achieve.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard
achieve.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
Frances achieved very good exam results.
achieve.translation[0].definitions[0].no: In everyday English, people usually say someone gets a result rather than achieves it:
He got good grades in his final exams.
achieve.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to be successful in a particular kind of job or activity
achieve.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We want all our students to achieve within their chosen profession.
